00037 #include <cmath>

00039 #include "egs_interpolator.h"
00040 #include "egs_functions.h"

00042 EGS_Interpolator::EGS_Interpolator() : n(0), own_data(true) {};
00043 
00044 EGS_Interpolator::EGS_Interpolator(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00045                          const EGS_Float *values) : n(0), own_data(true) {
00046     initialize(nbin,Xmin,Xmax,values);
00047 }
00048 
00049 EGS_Interpolator::EGS_Interpolator(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00050           EGS_InterpolatorFuncion func, void *data) : n(0), own_data(true) {
00051     initialize(nbin,Xmax,Xmax,func,data);
00052 }
00053 
00054 EGS_Interpolator::EGS_Interpolator(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00055                          EGS_Float *a, EGS_Float *b) : n(0), own_data(true) {
00056     initialize(nbin,Xmax,Xmax,a,b);
00057 }
00058 
00059 EGS_Interpolator::EGS_Interpolator(EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00060                             EGS_InterpolatorFuncion func, void *data,
00061                             int nmax, EGS_Float accu) : n(0), own_data(true) {
00062     initialize(Xmin,Xmax,func,data,nmax,accu);
00063 }
00064 
00065 void EGS_Interpolator::clear() {
00066     if( n > 0 && own_data ) { delete [] a; delete [] b; n = 0; }
00067 }
00068 
00069 EGS_Interpolator::~EGS_Interpolator() { clear(); }
00070 
00071 void EGS_Interpolator::check(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax) {
00072     if(nbin < 2 ) egsFatal("EGS_Interpolator::initialize: \n"
00073          "    attempt to initialize the interpolator with %d bins\n",nbin);
00074     if( Xmin >= Xmax ) egsFatal("EGS_Interpolator::initialize: \n"
00075          "    Xmin must be > Xmax, I got Xmin=%g Xmax=%g\n",Xmin,Xmax);
00076 }
00077 
00078 void EGS_Interpolator::initialize(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00079                             const EGS_Float *values) {
00080     check(nbin,Xmin,Xmax); clear();
00081     own_data = true;
00082     n = nbin - 1;
00083     a = new EGS_Float [n], b = new EGS_Float [n];
00084     xmin = Xmin; xmax = Xmax;
00085     fmin = values[0]; fmax = values[n];
00086     EGS_Float dx = (xmax-xmin)/n;
00087     bx = 1/dx; ax = -xmin*bx;
00088     for(int j=0; j<n; j++) {
00089         b[j] = (values[j+1]-values[j])*bx;
00090         a[j] = values[j] - b[j]*(xmin + dx*j);
00091     }
00092 }
00093 
00094 void EGS_Interpolator::initialize(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00095                EGS_InterpolatorFuncion func,void *data) {
00096     EGS_Float *aux = new EGS_Float [nbin];
00097     EGS_Float dx = (Xmax - Xmin)/(nbin-1);
00098     for(int j=0; j<nbin; j++) aux[j] = func(Xmin + dx*j, data);
00099     initialize(nbin,Xmin,Xmax,aux);
00100     delete [] aux;
00101 }
00102 
00103 void EGS_Interpolator::initialize(int nbin, EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00104                             EGS_Float *A, EGS_Float *B) {
00105     check(nbin,Xmin,Xmax); clear();
00106     own_data = false; n = nbin - 1;
00107     xmin = Xmin; xmax = Xmax; EGS_Float dx = (xmax-xmin)/n;
00108     bx = 1/dx; ax = -xmin*bx;
00109     a = A; b = B;
00110     fmin = a[0] + b[0]*xmin; fmax = a[n-1]+b[n-1]*xmax;
00111 }
00112 
00113 void EGS_Interpolator::initialize(EGS_Float Xmin, EGS_Float Xmax,
00114                             EGS_InterpolatorFuncion func, void *data,
00115                             int nmax, EGS_Float accu) {
00116     check(nmax,Xmin,Xmax); clear();
00117     if( nmax <= 9 ) {
00118         initialize(nmax,Xmin,Xmax,func,data); return;
00119     }
00120     int nnow = 9; EGS_Float *tmp = new EGS_Float [nnow]; int j;
00121     EGS_Float ddx = (Xmax-Xmin)/(nnow-1);
00122     for(j=0; j<nnow; j++) tmp[j] = func(Xmin + ddx*j, data);
00123     while(1) {
00124         EGS_Float *tmp1 = new EGS_Float [nnow-1];
00125         for(j=0; j<nnow-1; j++) tmp1[j] = func(Xmin + ddx*(0.5+j),data);
00126         bool ok = true;
00127         for(j=0; j<nnow-1; j++) {
00128             EGS_Float fint = 0.5*(tmp[j] + tmp[j+1]);
00129             EGS_Float err = fabs(fint/tmp1[j]-1);
00130             if( err > accu ) { ok = false; break; }
00131         }
00132         if( ok ) {
00133             initialize(nnow,Xmin,Xmax,tmp); delete [] tmp; delete [] tmp1;
00134             return;
00135         }
00136         if( 2*nnow-1 > nmax ) { delete [] tmp; delete [] tmp1; break; }
00137         EGS_Float *aux = new EGS_Float [2*nnow-1];
00138         aux[0] = tmp[0]; int i = 1;
00139         for(j=1; j<nnow; j++) {
00140             aux[i++] = tmp1[j-1]; aux[i++] = tmp[j];
00141         }
00142         delete [] tmp; delete [] tmp1; tmp = aux;
00143         nnow = 2*nnow-1; ddx = (Xmax-Xmin)/(nnow-1);
00144     }
00145     initialize(nmax,Xmin,Xmax,func,data);
00146 }
